^[a-z0-9-]+$.description: the release id used for VM naming

git_ref.description: every time this git ref is updated, the release is deployed

environment_id.description: the environment id to run release nodes in, see protocol-config.json

deprecated.description: if true, this release is kept for historical purposes and not re-deployed

default.description: if true, this release's environment is used as the default for packaged releases
